models.name: AuditStamp
models.doc: Data captured on a resource/association/sub-resource level giving insight into when that resource/association/sub-resource moved into a particular lifecycle stage, and who acted to move it into that specific lifecycle stage.

fields.name: time

type.name: Time
type.doc: Number of milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. It must be a positive number

fields.doc: When did the resource/association/sub-resource move into the specific lifecycle stage represented by this AuditEvent.

fields.name: actor
fields.doc: The entity (e.g. a member URN) which will be credited for moving the resource/association/sub-resource into the specific lifecycle stage. It is also the one used to authorize the change.

fields.name: impersonator
fields.doc: The entity (e.g. a service URN) which performs the change on behalf of the Actor and must be authorized to act as the Actor.

fields.name: message
fields.doc: Additional context around how DataHub was informed of the particular change. For example: was the change created by an automated process, or manually.

models.name: EntityRelationship
models.doc: Downstream lineage information about a dataset including the source reporting the lineage

fields.name: created
fields.doc: Audit stamp containing who reported the lineage and when

fields.name: entity
fields.doc: The downstream dataset the lineage points to

fields.name: type
fields.doc: The type of the relationship

fields.name: relationships
fields.doc: List of related entities

fields.name: start
fields.doc: The start of the result set

fields.name: count
fields.doc: The start of the result set

fields.name: total
fields.doc: Total number of edges found.

models.name: EntityLineageResult
models.doc: A list of lineage information associated with a source Entity

fields.name: start
fields.doc: Start offset of the result set

fields.name: count
fields.doc: Number of results in the returned result set

fields.name: total
fields.doc: Total number of results in the result set

fields.name: filtered
fields.doc: The number of results that were filtered out of the page (soft-deleted or non-existent)

fields.name: relationships

items.name: LineageRelationship
items.doc: Metadata about a lineage relationship between two entities

fields.name: type
fields.doc: The type of the relationship

fields.name: entity
fields.doc: Entity that is related via lineage

fields.name: paths
fields.doc:
Optional list of entities between the source and destination node.
There can be multiple paths from the source to the destination.

fields.name: path
fields.doc: Optional list of entities between the source and destination node

fields.name: degree
fields.doc: Degree of relationship (number of hops to get to entity)

fields.name: createdOn
fields.doc: Timestamp for when this lineage relationship was created. Could be null.

fields.name: createdActor
fields.doc: Urn of the actor that created this lineage relationship. Could be null.

fields.name: updatedOn
fields.doc: Timestamp for when this lineage relationship was last updated. Could be null.

fields.name: updatedActor
fields.doc: Urn of the actor that last updated this lineage relationship. Could be null.

fields.name: isManual
fields.doc: Whether this lineage edge is a manual edge.
Relationships in the result set
